snippet: After brandishing a gun in a sidewalk dispute in Sheepshead Bay, a man held a woman and baby hostage and shot four responding officers, including a captain.
abstract: Nakwon Foxworth of Sheepshead Bay, Brooklyn, is charged with attempted murder and assault of a police officer after he engages New York City police in a close-range gun battle, shooting four officers, all of whom are expected to fully recover; Foxworth is in critical condition with a gunshot wound to the abdomen; Mayor Michael R Bloomberg notes that eight members of the New York City Police Dept have been shot in recent months, and all with illegal guns that came from out of state.
lead_paragraph: After brandishing a gun in a sidewalk dispute in Sheepshead Bay, a man held a woman and baby hostage and shot four responding officers, including a captain.

headline.main: Four Officers Are Shot in Brooklyn; Assailant Is Critically Wounded
